content.content: shall this be tagged as an easy one? or make it harder with some restrictions...?
make it a bit harder, else easy peasy.
Definitely a solid medium. Combining binary tree traversal with a variation of two sum. Not bad.
I think this is a little bit indirect comparing to two sum, so a decent medium.
The fact the two datasets are ordered makes it seem like a clever solution is required, but using hashmap yields a simple and effective O(n1 + n2) solution and makes their ordering obsolete.
